Waltham.Brandeis International Business School: Brandeis International Business School (IBS) is part of Brandeis University, located in Waltham, Massachusetts. Brandeis IBS offers graduate degree programs in business, finance and economics, with over 3,000 alumni in over 100 countries. Academics at Brandeis IBS focus on themes of international business and global economics, supplemented by over 70 faculty members, all of whom have research or corporate experience.
